abstract: New York Islanders and Pittsburgh Penguins, who combined for 346 penalty minutes and 10 ejections in a February game, are preparing for a rematch, and players have been reminded that NHL officials will be watching the game closely.
snippet: The Islanders and the Penguins, who combined for 346 penalty minutes and 10 ejections in a February game, have a rematch Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders and the Penguins, who combined for 346 penalty minutes and 10 ejections in a February game, have a rematch Tuesday.

headline.main: Revisiting Night of Taunts, Punches and Injuries
headline.print_headline: Revisiting Night of Taunts, Punches and Injuries
headline.seo: Islanders and Penguins Revisit Night of Taunts, Punches and Injuries
